issue.title: canliskor.xyz
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://canliskor.xyz/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcanliskor.xyz%2F) ### Comment > Frequently domain changes. Check if it is possible to add a generic rule. If not close this issue. > > ```AdBlock > ##body .sayfa-arka > ##div.noxstream-gorsel > a[aria-label*="Reklam"] > ``` > > `bigmacizle.com` > `showbettv3.com` > `showbettv4.com` > `tvbetticket6.com` > `bet10bettv9.com` > `oslobettv71.com` > `oslobettv75.com` > `oslobettv76.com` > `golvar24.us` > `golvar25.us` > `interspor31.us` > `interspor33.us` ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://bbs.jooyoo.net/read.php?tid-29248-keyword-QQ%C8%BA_html=](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fbbs.jooyoo.net%2Fread.php%3Ftid-29248-keyword-QQ%25C8%25BA_html%3D) ### Comment > 该网站屏蔽一些图片元素都不生效，像图片不能直接添加，需要复制地址到过滤器里面自己手动添加，还有像论坛的勋章也是，整一块元素无法屏蔽，刷新之后照样出现。 ### Screenshots
